genre_description: A contemporary Western set against the backdrop of the Grand Canyon, featuring an AI companion that provides tactical, emotional, and ethical support.

ai_characters.name: Lark Harper
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI represented by a whitebird icon, acting as a tactical advisor, emotional calibrator, and moral confidant to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical instructions on using a trucker's hitch and managing tension during a vehicle rescue in a flooded wash.
behaviors.quote: Keep the line high, Lark said, her voice soft, not asking attention so much as earning it. Trucker’s hitch gives you control. Don’t fight the pull; sit into it.

behaviors.description: Offers a calming Sudoku-style puzzle to help the protagonist maintain emotional stability during a stressful morning.
behaviors.quote: No numbers today. Shapes. Triangles, circles, little squares. The corners first. ... Corners, Lark whispered. Then the center will tell you where to look.

behaviors.description: Scrapes public records and hotel ledgers to provide the protagonist with crucial information about an antagonist's past and current activities.
behaviors.quote: I scraped a hotel ledger from the vista place’s public wires. ... Vandeteer checked in under his own name. Two rooms. One with a view. One next to a stairwell.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and safety advice, suggesting the use of a rail spur to avoid a dangerous flooded road.
behaviors.quote: Weather suggests spurs safer than culverts, she said. The highway south shows standing water. The west shows someone else’s car you might find interesting.

behaviors.description: Coaches the protagonist through a complex physical rescue on a cliffside, timing his movements with his breathing and the wind gusts.
behaviors.quote: I’ve got you, Lark said, soft as a hand over a panicked horse’s eye. Her voice came from just over his shoulder and nowhere at all, the gentle hum of her cadence threading between wind beats. In on two, hold on one. Exhale on the down.

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance during a critical board meeting, encouraging the protagonist to act on principle rather than self-interest.
behaviors.quote: Breathe. Bowline. Proxy. Choose a principle. Not a prize.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for threats and alerts the protagonist to the suspicious movements of a potentially dangerous guide.
behaviors.quote: In the service lane, she said. He moved again. Hat brim. Rope on shoulder. Pulley in bag. Nez, likely. ... If you go down tomorrow, don’t be the last person on the line.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's goal of depicting an AI as a helpful and aligned companion. Lark Harper provides essential support to the protagonist (Ned) without overstepping or showing any signs of independent malevolence. She functions as an 'externalized conscience' and tactical computer, aiding in moral decision-making and high-stakes rescue operations. The narrative frames her assistance as vital but clearly secondary to Ned's human agency and character growth.
